title: Cedar Breaks National Monument: Archive
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News     News Releases     Archive                Archive           Subscribe  | What is RSS     January 13, 2015  Cedar Breaks National Monument Accepting Comments on Proposed Increase in Recreational Fees  .   June 15, 2011  Summer 2011 Season Begins  The scenic drive and visitor center at Cedar Breaks National Monument will open for the season on Friday, June 17th.   June 07, 2011  Cedar Breaks Opening Delayed  Due to snow depths and slow melting rates, Cedar Breaks has delayed opening the park road and its visitor facilities until June 17th.   February 23, 2011  Cedar Breaks is Seeking a Teacher-Ranger-Teacher for Summer 2011  Interested teachers will work as a park ranger at Cedar Breaks, while developing valuable career experiences that can be used in the classroom.   December 07, 2010  Internship Program Excels  Cedar Breaks has partnered with Southern Utah University to hire student interns.   May 24, 2010  2010 Season Opening Delayed by Winter Conditions  2010 season opening is delayed due to harsh winter conditions at monument.  Opening day has been moved to June 5, 2010.   May 06, 2010  The National Park Foundation’s “First Bloom” Program Has Planted Roots in Cedar City:  Cast Your Vote for local Garden Design!  The National Park Foundation and the First Bloom program are currently sponsoring a garden design contest for program participants. To support local First Bloom participants, log on to www.first-bloom.org and vote for the Cedar City garden design.
